DOC.brief_title: Appetite Profile After Intake Rye Breakfast Meal
DOC.detailed_description: The aim present study investigate rye grain structure influence perceive appetite . A comparison whole rye kernel mill rye kernel do two study part . In first part rye serve porridge breakfast second one mill whole kernel include bread breakfast . In order observe potential effect would arise remains meal reach colon , period measurement set 8 h intake iso-caloric rye bread rye porridge breakfast . A randomized , crossover design use compare effect iso-caloric breakfast meal subjective appetite 8 h consumption .
DOC.criteria: 20 60 year ; body mass index ( BMI ) 1827 kg/m2 ; habit consume breakfast , lunch dinner every day willingness comply study procedure intake medicine likely affect appetite food intake ; medical condition involve gastrointestinal tract ; eat disorder ; smoking ; consumption three cup coffee per day ; change body weight 10 % three month prior screen ; consumption restrict diet vegan , gluten free , slimming etc . ; pregnancy , lactation wish become pregnant study period
